3: This is the Museum Estate—the final station of Rail 11 of City 015. The Ascendant traces ended here.
Yes. According to the records, this was an estate privately owned by a business magnate of the Transatlantic Economic Community, back in the Golden Age.
This person has a liking to collection, especially bionic machines. This museum of machines was once open for viewing even for normal citizens.
I've heard of this before as well. Bionic research was one of the more well-developed fields back then, and various animal replications were made.
Commandant! According to the worldwide viral density distribution mappings of the past years, this area has stayed in a low to medium degree of density for a long period of time.
And according to the scans just now, active Corrupted nearby are also scarce.
So at least, this shouldn't be the enemy's nest.
This Museum Estate has Anti-Punishing Virus measures built in since the Post-Pandemic Age, and has acted as a shelter facility until the end of the 'Great Withdrawal'.
Though the viral density is lower here than in City 015, we've still been receiving distress signals from recon squads. The enemies here are not just the Corrupted...
Ascendant powers are still an unknown factor, we must be careful.
